entry.title: Installing Boost
entry.content:
Simple command to install Boost for Ubuntu

sudo apt-get install libboost-dev libboost-doc

entry.title: Check Duplicate in MySQL
entry.content:
Simple snippet:

sql SQL to check duplicate entry SELECT `name`, COUNT(`name`) as cnt FROM `members` GROUP BY `name` HAVING cnt > 1 ORDER by cnt;

entry.title: CSS3 Gradient and Transparency
entry.content:
Due to inconsistency of CSS3 implementation across different web browser, I wish to leave some note on Gradient and Transparency.

Transparency

css Mozilla and Webkit based background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); css IE based background:transparent; filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr=#50000000,endColorstr=#50000000);

Gradient

css Mozilla based background: -moz-linear-gradient(rgba(255,131,126,1) 0%, (255,131,126,0) 95%; css Webkit based background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(rgba(255,131,126,1)),to(rgba(255,131,126,0))); css IE based background:transparent; filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr=#FFFF837E, endColorstr=#00FF837E);

References:

  1. MSDN http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms532930.aspx
  2. Stackoverflow http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2293910/css3-transparency-gradient
  3. CSS Tricks http://css-tricks.com/rgba-browser-support/
